scripts.db:init: docker exec -it sd-postgres psql -U sd_admin -d social_distance -c "CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, total_distance_meters FLOAT DEFAULT 0.0, last_sync_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW()); INSERT INTO users (id) VALUES ('1') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
scripts.dev: npm run services:up && sleep 5 && npm run db:init && node --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning --loader ts-node/esm src/app.ts
